Join our Team

We are passionate about DevOps and understand the advantages and disadvantages that the different methodologies can bring for different situations.

Software Engineer, Kubernetes/Golang

We are building a high-performance team that is excited by complex engineering challenges and is passionate about making transportation safer, more affordable, and accessible for all.

What We're Looking for
  • Degree in Computer Engineering, Computer Science or a related field
  • Experience with: GIT, Go Lang, PostgreSQL, ReactJs, Linux Environment
  • Experience building and maintaining REST API with scalable auth strategies
  • Experience with Docker and Kubernetes based systems
  • Experience with scaling cloud services and building highly available services

Job Location: Gachibowli, Hyderabad, India

How to Apply

Send your latest resume to shyam@kubeify.com with the following details:

  • Total Experience
  • Relevant Experience
  • Notice Period
  • Current CTC
  • Expected CTC
Kubeify's team decrease the time it takes to adopt open source technology while enabling consistent application environments across deployments...letting our developers focus on application code while improving speed and quality of our releases.
- Yaron Oren, Founder Maverick.ai (acquired by OutboundWorks)
